root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 7-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: After completing data compilation, the World Bank initially contacted each task team leader for highly strategic countries or countries with data discrepancy issue. Following the initial round, the World Bank coordinates with internal stakeholders and the UN regional commissions to validate data accuracy through multiple rounds. In this process, the World Bank is in charge of responding to any inquiries and comments.
